LanguageData.Mizu_Bucket.label: Bucket
LanguageData.Mizu_Bucket.description: A tool for firefighting. Pawns can extinguish fires more efficiently by using this.
LanguageData.Mizu_Bucket.verbs.throw_water.label: throw water
LanguageData.Mizu_Mop.label: Mop
LanguageData.Mizu_Mop.description: A tool for cleaning. Allows to clean more cleanly on the artifical floors.
LanguageData.Mizu_Towel.label: Towel
LanguageData.Mizu_Towel.description: A tool for nursing. Allows pawn to nurse patients and help them recover from disease.
LanguageData.Mizu_UnfinishedTool.label: unfinished tool
LanguageData.Mizu_WateringPot.label: Watering pot
LanguageData.Mizu_WateringPot.description: A tool for growing. Allows pawn to water growing zone for increasing fertility.
LanguageData.Proj_BucketWater.label: Water from bucket
